reviewText: If you are interested in the topic of machine learning, this is the start book for you. It is quite informative and covers the actual methods of learning and the concepts involved. It is not the most readable but the author does a good job livening it up. For that matter, I do not know how to convey the topic in a readable fashion so compared against other similar books, the presentation is outstanding. For those in the field, this is a must.
title: Machine Learning
